#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

long long count;
int size;

void merge(int a[],int beg,int mid,int end)
{
	int b[size];
	int i,j,k;
	for(i=beg,j=mid+1,k=0;i<=mid||j<=end;k++)
	{
		if(j>end||(a[i]<a[j]&&i<=mid))
			b[k]=a[i++];
		else	
		{
			b[k]=a[j++];
			count+=(mid-i+1);
		}
	}
	for(i=beg,k=0;i<=end;i++,k++)
		a[i]=b[k];
//	cout<<count<<"("<<beg<<","<<end<<") ";
}

void msort(int a[],int beg,int end)
{
	if(end-beg)
	{
		int mid=(beg+end)/2;
		msort(a,beg,mid);
		msort(a,mid+1,end);
		merge(a,beg,mid,end);
	}
}

int main()
{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	count=0;
	int a[n];
	size = n;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		scanf("%d",a+i);
	msort(a, 0, n-1);
	cout<<count<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
